value.title: Chinese activist Ai Weiwei says Credit Suisse closing his foundation's bank account
value.excerpt: Chinese dissident and artist Ai Weiwei has said Credit Suisse told him it was closing his foundation's bank account in Switzerland earlier this year citing his "criminal record" in China, despite the activist never being convicted of a crime.
